tutorials.title: Job: Micrograph Denoiser (BETA) (v4.5+)
tutorials.description: Produce enhanced micrograph images to aid particle picking and visual inspection.

tutorials.title: Job: Reference Based Auto Select 2D (BETA) (v4.5+)
tutorials.description: Select 2D classes automatically based on their similarity to a 3D reference.

tutorials.title: Job: Reference Based Auto Select 3D (BETA) (v4.5+)
tutorials.description: Select 3D volumes automatically based on their similarity to a 3D reference.

tutorials.title: Job: Reference Based Auto Select 3D (BETA) (v4.5+)
tutorials.description: Select 3D volumes automatically based on their similarity to a 3D reference.

tutorials.title: Job: Rebalance Orientations (v4.5+)
tutorials.description: Rebalance the orientation distribution of particles that have been aligned to a 3D reference to make it more uniform by removing particles from oversampled views.

tutorials.title: Upload Local Files (v4.5+)
tutorials.description: Upload files from your local computer to CryoSPARC directly in the browser.

tutorials.title: File Browser - Bookmarks (v4.5+)
tutorials.description: The file browser now allows for bookmarking directories for common access.

tutorials.title: Workflows (v4.4+)
tutorials.description: Workflows make it easy to replicate processing that you’ve done before. Select a chain of jobs to create a Workflow, and re-create it in any project or workspace with a single click.

tutorials.title: Blueprints (v4.4+)
tutorials.description: Define custom parameters and annotations as a template for any job type.

tutorials.title: Job: Reference Based Motion Correction (BETA) (v4.4+)
tutorials.description: Reference Based Motion Correction improves final resolution and map quality by re-estimating per-particle motion trajectories using a reference volume.

tutorials.title: Tutorial: Common CryoSPARC Plots
tutorials.description: Detailed explanations of plots produced in 2D Classification and 3D reconstruction and refinement jobs.

tutorials.title: Tutorial: Orientation Diagnostics (v4.4+)
tutorials.description: Easily diagnose the presence of preferred orientation with new statistics and plots.

tutorials.title: Tutorial: EPU AFIS Beam Shift Import (v4.4+)
tutorials.description: Import movies/micrographs with beam shift values and automatically cluster into exposure groups.

tutorials.title: Tutorial: Symmetry Relaxation (v4.4+)
tutorials.description: Resolve pseudosymmetry and symmetry-mismatched complexes in 3D refinements.

tutorials.title: Tutorial: Float 16 Support (v4.4+)
tutorials.description: Save particles and motion-corrected micrographs in float16 format, using less precision and half the disk space compared to default (float32).

tutorials.title: Tutorial: BILD files (v4.4+)
tutorials.description: Visualize 3D viewing direction distributions in UCSF Chimera(X) using coloured cylinders of varying height defined in BILD files.

tutorials.title: Guide: Data Cleanup (v4.3+)
tutorials.description: A guide to using the new Data Cleanup tool and associated strategies for marking jobs as final, pruning workspaces and projects, and compacting Live Sessions.

tutorials.title: Guide: Reduce Database Size (v4.3+)
tutorials.description: How to reduce the size of large CryoSPARC databases using methods provided by MongoDB.

tutorials.title: Guide: Performance Benchmarking (v4.3+)
tutorials.description: How to measure and compare key aspects of CryoSPARC performance across CPU, filesystem and GPU operations.

tutorials.title: Application Guide (v4.0+)
tutorials.description: Comprehensive guide to the new CryoSPARC interface, working with projects, workspaces, sessions and jobs, as well as filtering and tagging.

tutorials.title: Tutorial: 3D Flexible Refinement
tutorials.description: An in-depth guide to 3DFlex, a motion-based deep generative model for continuous heterogeneity.

tutorials.title: Guide: Configuring Custom Variables for Cluster Job Submission Scripts
tutorials.description: User-set variables can be injected into cluster submission scripts before a job is queued.

tutorials.title: Job: Restack Particles
tutorials.description: Restack Particles is useful for filtering unused particles from .mrc files, can speed up caching, and helps with data management.

tutorials.title: Job: DeepEMhancer (Wrapper)
tutorials.description: Wrapper job for DeepEMhancer, a deep learning model trained to perform masking-like and sharpening-like post-processing on cryo-EM maps.

tutorials.title: Job: Average Power Spectra
tutorials.description: This job takes the outputs of a Select 2D Classes job and generates averaged power spectra for each desired class, to assist with determining the helical symmetry present in the sample.

tutorials.title: Job: 3D Classification (BETA)
tutorials.description: Improved algorithm and diagnostics in CryoSPARC v4.0: FSC-based regularization, new convergence criteria, and more.

tutorials.title: Tutorial: 3D Classification (BETA)
tutorials.description: Newly updated for CryoSPARC v4.0 with multiple datasets and use cases.

tutorials.title: Tutorial: Tips for Membrane Protein Structures
tutorials.description: Tips for working with membrane protein targets in CryoSPARC, sorted by the different stages of processing.

tutorials.title: Guide: Maintenance Mode and Configurable User Facing Messages
tutorials.description: Once an administrator has turned on maintenance mode, the queue will be paused. When existing running jobs are complete, the instance will be idle and the administrator can re-start, update, etc. Also includes information on configurable message of the day and login message.

tutorials.title: Guide: Installation Testing with `cryosparcm test`
tutorials.description: Verify that CryoSPARC is your instance is correctly installed by using `cryosparcm test install` and `cryosparcm test workers` via the command line. Running these functions will perform several tests that ensure users can seamlessly launch jobs and process data in CryoSPARC.

tutorials.title: Guide: Data Management in CryoSPARC (v4.0+)
tutorials.description: CryoSPARC projects are now explicitly “locked” to a single CryoSPARC instance at any given time. Use the new Attach, Detach, Archive and Unarchive actions to manage the project life cycle and moving project directories.

tutorials.title: Troubleshooting
tutorials.description: Overview of common issues and advice on how to resolve them.

tutorials.title: Guide: Download Error Reports
tutorials.description: Learn how to download a complete job error report (including job details, job event logs, browser diagnostics and system logs), as well as system error report, to assist with troubleshooting.

tutorials.title: Guide: Cluster Integration Validation
tutorials.description: New functions in CryoSPARC v4.0 for testing cluster integrations and polling the cluster scheduler to ensure that job status is reflected in the CryoSPARC instance.
